## mergeExtensions() function

Takes an array of extensions from the App Registry, an array of extensions from the Extension Manager, and merges them into a list of Extensions. If an extension is disabled in the Extension Manager, it is removed from the list. Extension list from the App Registry is used as a base. 

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function mergeExtensions(appRegistryExtensions: InstalledExtensions, extensionManagerExtensions: ExtensionManagerExtension[], extensionPointId: ExtensionPointId): InstalledExtensions;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  appRegistryExtensions | [InstalledExtensions](./uix-host.installedextensions.md) |  |
|  extensionManagerExtensions | [ExtensionManagerExtension](./uix-host-react.extensionmanagerextension.md)<!-- -->\[\] |  |
|  extensionPointId | [ExtensionPointId](./uix-host-react.extensionpointid.md) |  |

**Returns:**

[InstalledExtensions](./uix-host.installedextensions.md)
